summary: "The Wolf of Wall Street" is a 2013 movie directed by Martin Scorsese, based on Jordan Belfort's life as a corrupt stockbroker. It stars Leonardo DiCaprio as Belfort, who builds a successful but illegal business, Stratton Oakmont. The film shows his rise to wealth and power and eventual downfall due to fraud and corruption. It's famous for its intense language, graphic content, and controversial financing. Despite some criticism, it was a big hit and received many award nominations.
title: The Wolf of Wall Street (2013 film)
